Let us <S%G21>rejoice<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> be exceedingly <S%G5463>glad,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> let us <S%G1325>give<s%> the <S%G1391>glory<s%> to <S%G846>him.<s%> <S%G3754>For<s%> the <S%G1062>marriage<s%> of the <S%G721>Lamb<s%> has <S%G2064>come,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G1135>wife<s%> has <S%G2090>made<s%> <S%G1438>herself<s%> <S%G2090>ready.<s%>"

<S%G2532><s%> He <S%G3004>said<s%> to <S%G3427>me,<s%> <S%G1125>"Write,<s%> <S%G3107><s%> 'Blessed are those <S%G3588>who<s%> are <S%G2564>invited<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> the <S%G1062>marriage<s%> <S%G1173>supper<s%> of the <S%G721>Lamb.<s%>'" <S%G2532><s%> He <S%G3004>said<s%> to <S%G3427>me,<s%> <S%G3778>"These<s%> <S%G1526>are<s%> <S%G228>true<s%> <S%G3056>words<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>"

<S%G2532><s%> <S%G4016>He<s%> is <S%G4016>clothed<s%> in a <S%G2440>garment<s%> <S%G911>sprinkled<s%> with <S%G129>blood.<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G846>His<s%> <S%G3686>name<s%> is <S%G2564>called<s%> "The <S%G3056>Word<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>"

<S%G2443>that<s%> you may <S%G5315>eat<s%> the <S%G4561>flesh<s%> of <S%G935>kings,<s%> <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G4561>flesh<s%> of <S%G5506>captains,<s%> <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G4561>flesh<s%> of mighty <S%G2478>men,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G4561>flesh<s%> of <S%G2462>horses<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> of those who <S%G2521>sit<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G4561>flesh<s%> of <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G1658>men,<s%> both free <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1401>slave,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3398>small<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3173>great.<s%>"
